content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(10.5, 10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position 10.5, 10.5), boiler(position -6.0, 24.5) and offshore pump (position -9.5, 24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(43.0, -84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position 43.0, -84.0) and a furnace at position(40.0, -82.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position -15.0, -50.0) and a furnace at position(45.0, -83.0)
-  Furnace at position(42.0, -81.0)
-  Furnace at position(45.0, -80.0)
-  Furnace at position(40.0, -79.0)

### Iron ore storage at position(43.5, -82.5)
Consists of wooden chest (position 43.5, -82.5) connected to burner mining drill (position 43.0, -84.0)

### Iron ore storage at position(-16.5, -49.5)
Consists of wooden chest (position -16.5, -49.5) connected to burner mining drill (position -15.0, -50.0)

### Lab at unknown position
Consists of lab with input automation-science-pack

### Inserter system at position(3.5, 0.5)
Consists of burner inserter (position 3.5, 0.5) connected to wooden chest (position 2.5, 0.5)

### Inserter system at position(0.5, 3.5)
Consists of burner inserter (position 0.5, 3.5) connected to wooden chest (position 0.5, 2.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner mining drills
- Ensure that the burner mining drill has fuel before starting to mine
- Make sure to place the burner mining drill near the resource you want to mine

### Errors when using furnaces
- Ensure that the furnace has the required ingredients to smelt
- Make sure to place the furnace near the resource you want to smelt

### Errors when using boilers
- Ensure that the boiler has fuel before starting to heat water
- Make sure to place the boiler near the offshore pump

### Errors when using offshore pumps
- Ensure that the offshore pump is connected to a pipe group
- Make sure to place the offshore pump near a body of water

### Errors when using steam engines
- Ensure that the steam engine is connected to a pipe group
- Make sure to place the steam engine near a boiler

### Errors when using generators
- Ensure that the generator has input liquid
- Make sure to place the generator near a pipe group

### Errors when using pipe groups
- Ensure that the pipe group is connected to a fluid system
- Make sure to place the pipe group near a fluid source or sink

### Errors when using electric groups
- Ensure that the electric group is connected to a power source
- Make sure to place the electric group near a power source or a device that uses power
